official_title: A joint resolution disapproving proposed agreements with Palau relating to the enforcement of laws and use of U.S. assistance, and a proposed plan for the development of Palau, and for other purposes.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Disapproves a proposed plan for the economic development of Palau and the following proposed agreements with Palau: (1) the Agreement Regarding Mutual Assistance in Law Enforcement Assistance Matters; and (2) the Agreement Concerning Procedures for the Implementation of United States Economic Assistance, Programs and Services Provided in the Compact of Free Association (Fiscal Procedures Agreement).

titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving proposed agreements with Palau relating to the enforcement of laws and use of U.S. assistance, and a proposed plan for the development of Palau, and for other purposes.
